statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_tracking;
SELECT equipment_name, usage_hours FROM equipment_tracking ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_tracking WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT * FROM equipment_tracking WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, usage_hours FROM equipment_tracking ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_tracking WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, usage_hours FROM equipment_tracking WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_tracking ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date, usage_hours FROM equipment_tracking WHERE usage_hours > 100 ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(usage_hours) AS avg_usage_hours FROM equipment_tracking;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_location FROM equipment
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(equipment_id) AS total_equipment FROM equipment
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive'
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name = 'Machine A';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_location FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Tools' AND equipment_location LIKE '%Warehouse%';

SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS maintenance_count FROM equipment LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING COUNT(schedule_id) > 3;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_name, location, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician LIKE '%John%' AND maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS maintenance_count FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id WHERE equipment.location != 'Factory' ORDER BY equipment_name ASC,maintenance_records.maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, location FROM equipment WHERE status='available';
SELECT equipment_id, log_time, action FROM equipment_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT history_id, schedule_id, technician FROM maintenance_history WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT name, status FROM equipment WHERE status = 'working' ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT equipment_logs.log_time, equipment.name, equipment_logs.action FROM equipment_logs INNER JOIN equipment ON equipment_logs.equipment_id = equipment.id WHERE equipment.status = 'maintenance' ORDER BY equipment_logs.log_time DESC;

SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_schedule.maintenance_date, maintenance_history.completion_date, maintenance_history.technician FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id INNER JOIN maintenance_history ON maintenance_schedule.schedule_id = maintenance_history.schedule_id WHERE technician = 'John Doe' AND maintenance_schedule.maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT equipment.name, COUNT(maintenance_schedule.schedule_id) AS total_maintenance FROM equipment LEFT JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment.name HAVING total_maintenance > 2 ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location_id FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_id FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, phone_number FROM technicians WHERE technician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine'
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person FROM locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Headquarter%'
SELECT technician_name, phone_number FROM technicians ORDER BY technician_name DESC
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id
